briefdescription.para: Gets the current player password.
Sets the password for players to login.
Clears the player password required to login.
Gets the current DM password.
Sets the password for DMs to login.
Signals the server to immediately shut down.
Boots the a player from the server with the provided strref as message.

parameterdescription.para: The string reference of the message to send the PC being booted.

xrefdescription.para: Will be removed in NWNX:EE 64 bit, use native BootPC now.

briefdescription.para: Deletes the player character from the servervault.

detaileddescription.para: The PC will be immediately booted from the game with a "Delete Character" message

parameterdescription.para: If true, it will leave the file on server, only appending ".deleted0" to the bic filename.

briefdescription.para: Bans the provided IP.
Removes the ban on the provided IP.
Bans the provided Public CD Key.

parameterdescription.para: The Public CD Key to ban.

briefdescription.para: Removes the ban on the provided Public CD Key.

parameterdescription.para: The Public CD Key to unban.

briefdescription.para: Bans the provided playername.

parameterdescription.para: The player name (community name) to ban.

simplesect.para: A user can change their playername at will.

briefdescription.para: Removes the ban on the provided playername.

parameterdescription.para: The player name (community name) to unban.

briefdescription.para: Get a list of all banned IPs/Keys/names as a string.

simplesect.para: A string with a listing of the banned IPs/Keys/names.

briefdescription.para: Set the module's name as shown to the serverlist.

parameterdescription.para: The name to give the module.

briefdescription.para: Set the server's name as shown to the serverlist.

parameterdescription.para: The name to give the server.

briefdescription.para: Get an Administration Options value.

simplesect.para: The current setting for the supplied option from Administration Options.

briefdescription.para: Set an Administration Options to a value.

parameterdescription.para: The option to adjust from Administration Options.
The new value for the option.

briefdescription.para: Delete the TURD of playerName + characterName.

detaileddescription.para: At times a PC may get stuck in a permanent crash loop when attempting to log in. This function allows administrators to delete their Temporary User Resource Data where the PC's current location is stored allowing them to log into the starting area.
